item.title: ML Pipelines
item.description: ML Pipelines # Pipeline Orchestrators: infrastructure for automating, monitoring and maintaining model training and deployment. Examples: Airflow, Argo, Celery, Luigi, KubeFlow. TensorFlow Extended (TFX) # Open-source end-to-end platform for deploying production ML pipelines.
